word_mean: 〔复sori〕孢子堆，孢子团，孢子囊群：植物、真菌和原虫体产生的一团、一群或一簇孢子、孢子囊或生殖体

means.word_mean: 1. a spore-producing structure in certain lichens and fungi
2. cluster of sporangia usually on underside of a fern frond

auth_sentence.content: Each sorus is made up of clusters of structures called sporangia that contain spores for reproduction.
